10. Who is the Contact Person?

    Who should be contacted with any questions on the day of the event? Include contact person's name, office, cell & work number.
11. 1. I understand that if I am requesting elected officials to speak about a topic related to city operations, I need to provide written speaking remarks a week in advance of the event.
12. Proclamation Request Form

    If you would like a proclamation presented at the event, please also fill out the Proclamation Request Form and submit it at least two weeks prior to the event.
13. 1. I understand that if photos of my non-City sponsored event are needed, I must provide the photographer and camera to take the photo(s). The City is unable to provide photography services for events not directly sponsored by the City.
14. 1. I understand that the request must be submitted two weeks in advance to the event or function.
15. 1. Receive an email copy of this form.
